description: This Java class 'Converter' provides a utility for converting old string variable markers '@xxx@' and '$xxx' into a newer '${xxx}' format, supporting substitution engines. It includes command-line parsing, file reading/writing, and regex-based pattern matching and replacement.

classes.name: Converter
classes.description: A utility class to convert variable markup styles in files or strings from '@xxx@' and '$xxx' to '${xxx}'.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point for command-line utility; parses arguments and performs file conversion.

methods.name: convertFile
methods.description: Reads a file and converts its content, replacing old variable markers with new format.

methods.name: convertString
methods.description: Converts old variable markers in a given string to new ${xxx} format.

methods.name: readFile
methods.description: Reads the entire contents of a file into a string.

methods.name: doReplace
methods.description: Performs regex-based pattern matching and string replacement to convert variable formats.
